package.name: Mage_nopobox
package.summary: Check shipping address whether it contains POBOX.
package.description:
The extension updates the Magento checkout fields to prevent shipping to a POBOX address. It also provides error message to inform customers that they must enter a valid shipping address before proceeding through checkout.

How to install

  1. install extension ,please follow this pdf Magento Connect Installing Extensions (PDF) .
  2. Go to System->Configuration->Matt Module->Matt Nopobox Setting->Options, set Enabled to Yes and save config.
  3. it will works very well!

Features

  • add admin config option
  • add allow country option
  • add custom error message option
package.notes: Matt Nopobox extension 1.1.0 has release! Features 1. add admin config option 2. add allow country option 3. add custom error message option
